column2: when we asked for the check
column3: our server realized we didn't order dessert and gave us 2 free ones because she saw how much we enjoyed the food
column4: and told us it'd be a shame if we didn't try their desserts. One was the famous fried milk
column5: the other I'm not exactly sure (peanut butter semifreddo maybe?). Either way
column6: both were delicious and honestly went beyond all my expectations. I'm not a dessert person (it's why we didn't order any)
column7: but when I come back again
column8: I will definitely have to order the fried milk. Even it was well-balanced. Not too sweet
column10: and over all an excellent blend of unexpected textures. I really only have praise for this place.
